column3: sílaige ‎(“disseminator”)  sílaigidir, sílaid ‎(“sows; causes, brings about, produces; disseminates, spreads abroad, publishes; generates, multiplies, propagates; spreads, scatters; breeds; springs, takes issue, is generated; spreads, multiplies”)

column1: Note: Some of these forms may be hypothetical. Not everypossible mutated form of every word actually occurs.
